nl.tue.geometrycore.gui

Class GUIUtil

  • java.lang.Object
    • nl.tue.geometrycore.gui.GUIUtil

  • public class GUIUtil
extends java.lang.Object
    Utility class providing convenience methods for GUI code to reduce code duplication.

    • Method Detail

      • makeMainFrame

        public static javax.swing.JFrame makeMainFrame(java.lang.String title,
                                               GeometryPanel draw,
                                               TabbedSidePanel side,
                                               FrameLogo logo)
        Creates and shows a JFrame window, with a given title. The frame is shown maximized initially and has minimal dimensions of 300x300. It uses a border layout to place a draw panel in the center and a tabbed side panel on the left. The constructed frame terminates the java program on close.
        Parameters:
        title - Title for the JFrame
        draw - Draw panel to be placed centrally
        side - Side panel to be placed on the left (may be null)
        logo - Logo set to use for the frame
        Returns:
        the constructed and shown JFrame

      • makeMainFrame

        public static javax.swing.JFrame makeMainFrame(java.lang.String title,
                                               GeometryPanel draw,
                                               TabbedSidePanel side)
        Creates and shows a JFrame window, with a given title. The frame is shown maximized initially and has minimal dimensions of 300x300. It uses a border layout to place a draw panel in the center and a tabbed side panel on the left. The constructed frame terminates the java program on close.
        Parameters:
        title - Title for the JFrame
        draw - Draw panel to be placed centrally
        side - Side panel to be placed on the left (may be null)
        Returns:
        the constructed and shown JFrame
